content.raw:
Hi, none of the suggestions work for me. It seems that CMake finds and sets all the required variables, but it either doesn’t set TINYXML2\_FOUND=1 or it doesn’t generate the tinyxml2::tinyxml2 target.

```
$ grep -i tinyxml2 build/gazebo/CMakeCache.txt  | sort
//ADVANCED property for variable: TINYXML2_LIBRARY_tinyxml2
gazebo_util_LIB_DEPENDS:STATIC=general;gazebo_common;general;gazebo_transport;general;gazebo_msgs;general;tinyxml2;general;ignition-transport4::ignition-transport4;general;ignition-msgs1::ignition-msgs1;
gztinyxml2_CFLAGS_I:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_CFLAGS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_CFLAGS_OTHER:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_FOUND:INTERNAL=1
gztinyxml2_INCLUDEDIR:INTERNAL=/usr/include
gztinyxml2_INCLUDE_DIRS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_LDFLAGS:INTERNAL=-ltinyxml2
gztinyxml2_LDFLAGS_OTHER:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_LIBDIR:INTERNAL=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
gztinyxml2_LIBRARIES:INTERNAL=tinyxml2
gztinyxml2_LIBRARY_DIRS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_LIBS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_LIBS_L:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_LIBS_OTHER:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_LIBS_PATHS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_PREFIX:INTERNAL=/usr
gztinyxml2_STATIC_CFLAGS_I:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_CFLAGS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_CFLAGS_OTHER:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_INCLUDE_DIRS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LDFLAGS:INTERNAL=-ltinyxml2
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LDFLAGS_OTHER:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LIBDIR:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LIBRARIES:INTERNAL=tinyxml2
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LIBRARY_DIRS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LIBS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LIBS_L:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LIBS_OTHER:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_STATIC_LIBS_PATHS:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_tinyxml2_INCLUDEDIR:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_tinyxml2_LIBDIR:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_tinyxml2_PREFIX:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_tinyxml2_VERSION:INTERNAL=
gztinyxml2_VERSION:INTERNAL=6.0.0
PC_TINYXML2_CFLAGS_I:INTERNAL=
```
